definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לִירוֹא בַּחִצִּים]] 2Ch 26:15 shoot with arrows.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיּׁרא֠וּ]] 2Sa 11:24 and they shot at ([[אֶל־]]); Pt. pl. [[הַמּוֹרִא֠ים]] v:2Sa 11:24 the shooters, archers; Kt to be read [[וַיּׁרִאוּ]], [[הַמּוֹרַאִים]]; but Mas. nothing [[א]] as superfluous, would read [[וַיּׁרוּ]], [[הַמּוֹרִים]] from [[יׇרָה]] (Bö:§ 1088 (8), (9)).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. only in [[וּמַרְוֶה גַּם הוּא יוֹרֶָא]] Pr 11:25 he that watereth shall himself also be watered (Fl De MV al. derive—‘non bene,’ Thes—from √ [[רוה]], q. v., [[יוֹרֶא]] for …[[יׇרְוֶה]]; but v. Thes Ew:§ 131 f. Bö:§ 161 (4) SS Buhl Kö:i. 585; cf. [[ירה]]
